title: Implement client-side Filter builder
description:
Create filter.go with Filter builder (since Checkvist API has no server-side filtering):
- NewFilter(tasks []Task) *Filter
- WithTag(tag string) *Filter
- WithTags(tags ...string) *Filter (AND logic)
- WithStatus(status TaskStatus) *Filter
- WithDueBefore(t time.Time) *Filter
- WithDueAfter(t time.Time) *Filter
- WithDueOn(t time.Time) *Filter
- WithOverdue() *Filter
- WithSearch(query string) *Filter (searches in Content)
- Apply() []Task
Performance target: <10ms for 1000+ tasks
Filters are combined with AND logic.

title: Implement HTTP request helper with retry logic
description:
Add internal HTTP helper to client.go:
- doRequest(ctx, method, path, body) helper for all API calls
- Automatic authentication check before requests
- JSON marshaling/unmarshaling
- Exponential backoff retry for:
  - HTTP 429 (Too Many Requests)
  - HTTP 5xx (Server Errors)
  - Network errors (timeout, connection reset)
- Respect context cancellation
- Optional debug logging of requests/responses via slog

title: Implement Checklist operations
description:

title: Extended Features
description: Phase 3: Implement P1 (should-have) features including client-side filtering and builder patterns for fluent interfaces.

title: Implement data models
description:
Create models.go with all data structures:
- Checklist struct (ID, Name, Public, Archived, ReadOnly, TaskCount, TaskCompleted, Tags, TagsAsText, UpdatedAt)
- Task struct (ID, ChecklistID, ParentID, Content, Status, Position, Priority, Tags, TagsAsText, DueDateRaw, DueDate, AssigneeIDs, CommentsCount, UpdateLine, UpdatedAt, CreatedAt, Children, Notes)
- TaskStatus enum (StatusOpen=0, StatusClosed=1, StatusInvalidated=2)
- Note struct (ID, TaskID, Comment, UpdatedAt, CreatedAt)
- Tags type (map[string]bool)
- User struct (ID, Username, Email)
- DueDate struct with constructors (DueAt, DueString, DueInDays) and constants (DueToday, DueTomorrow, DueNextWeek, DueNextMonth)

title: Implement authentication with auto token renewal
description:
Add to client.go:
- Authenticate(ctx context.Context) error - explicit login
- refreshToken(ctx context.Context) error - token renewal
- ensureAuthenticated(ctx context.Context) error - auto-auth before requests
- CurrentUser(ctx context.Context) (*User, error) - get logged in user
- Token management: store token and expiry, auto-refresh before expiry
- Thread-safe token access using mutex
- Support for optional 2FA token
API endpoints:
- POST /auth/login.json?version=2 (login)
- POST /auth/refresh_token.json?version=2 (refresh)
- GET /auth/curr_user.json (current user)
Token sent via X-Client-Token header

title: Implement Task operations
description:
Create tasks.go with TaskService:
- client.Tasks(checklistID) returns TaskService
- List(ctx) ([]Task, error) - GET /checklists/{id}/tasks.json
- Get(ctx, taskID) (*Task, error) - GET /checklists/{id}/tasks/{task_id}.json (includes parent hierarchy)
- Create(ctx, builder *TaskBuilder) (*Task, error) - POST /checklists/{id}/tasks.json
- Update(ctx, taskID, opts) (*Task, error) - PUT /checklists/{id}/tasks/{task_id}.json
- Delete(ctx, taskID) error - DELETE /checklists/{id}/tasks/{task_id}.json
- Close(ctx, taskID) (*Task, error) - POST /checklists/{id}/tasks/{task_id}/close.json
- Reopen(ctx, taskID) (*Task, error) - POST /checklists/{id}/tasks/{task_id}/reopen.json
- Invalidate(ctx, taskID) (*Task, error) - POST /checklists/{id}/tasks/{task_id}/invalidate.json
Parse DueDate from DueDateRaw when retrieving tasks.

title: Implement TaskBuilder fluent interface
description:
Enhance task creation with builder pattern:
- NewTask(content string) *TaskBuilder
- WithTags(tags ...string) *TaskBuilder
- WithDueDate(due DueDate) *TaskBuilder
- WithPriority(p int) *TaskBuilder
- WithParent(parentID int64) *TaskBuilder
- WithPosition(pos int) *TaskBuilder
- Build() returns parameters for API call
TaskBuilder should be chainable and return itself for fluent usage:
  checkvist.NewTask("Content").WithTags("tag1").WithDueDate(checkvist.DueTomorrow).WithPriority(1)
